Bakugou Katsuki always knew that he had what it took to be a hero. He had a strong quirk, bravery, the drive to win, and even a sidekick already lined up for him. It was perfect!

  After, Katsuki became someone entirely different. He was no longer the determined leader with big dreams, but instead a cruel and vindictive child that asserted his dominance over others through blunt force. He stopped speaking to his best friend, Midoriya Izuku, and instead pushed others to isolate the boy. He held such a grudge against him for what happened, even though logically, Katsuki knew that it wasn’t his fault. Of course it wasn’t Izuku’s fault.

He supposed it didn’t matter anymore; he and Deku were friends now, they had both gotten into U.A., and were on the fast track to graduating at the top of their class. What had happened to them all those years ago was nothing more than a bad memory.

been, before Aizawa-sensei ruined it all.

Class 2-A shifted awkwardly in their seats, already knowing what was coming. “Let’s just get this over with so that we never have to talk about it again, alright?” The text on the projector screen popped up, revealing the subject matter for the next hour. 
Sex Ed.

He’d heard that, due to the dorms being established in their first year, the sex ed class this year would be different than it had been all the previous years. He had a bad feeling about what that might mean, and his theory wasn’t proven any better when a knock sounded on the classroom door.
